DashboardPage.description: Upload, search, and analyze your documents with ease.
DashboardPage.tipUpload: <bold_text>Upload:</bold_text> Drag & drop or click to upload text, PDFs, spreadsheets, and images.
DashboardPage.tipSearch: <bold_text>Search:</bold_text> Use the Semantic Search page to find information within your documents using natural language.
DashboardPage.tipAnalyze: <bold_text>Analyze:</bold_text> Ask questions or request summaries on the RAG page to get AI-powered insights.
DashboardPage.integrationsComingSoon: Import files directly from your cloud storage. (Coming soon via Zapier)

LoginPage.title: Gnosis.AI
LoginPage.description: Unlock insights from your data. Sign in to get started.
LoginPage.intro: Upload your documents, ask questions, and get intelligent summaries. Simplify your workflow and discover hidden knowledge.

FileUploadForm.title: Upload Your Files
FileUploadForm.description: Drag & drop files or click to select. Max 5MB per file, {maxFiles} files total.
FileUploadForm.dropzoneDefault: Drag 'n' drop some files here, or click to select files
FileUploadForm.uploadLimitExceededDescription: You can only select up to {maxFiles} files at a time.
FileUploadForm.noNewFilesToUploadDescription: All selected files are already processed or being uploaded.

FileList.uploadToStart: Upload some files to get started.

RagPage.title: Chat with Your Data
RagPage.description: Select a file to ask questions about it, or start a general conversation.
RagPage.selectFileDescription: Choose a document to interact with.
RagPage.askQuestionTitle: Ask a Question or Request a Summary
RagPage.askQuestionDescription: Ensure you have selected a file first. Example: "Summarize this document." or "What are the key financial figures?"
RagPage.queryPlaceholder: Type your question or summarization request here...
RagPage.selectAFileAlertDescription: Please select a file from the list on the left to start chatting.
RagPage.toastNoFileSelectedDescription: Please select a file to query.
RagPage.toastEmptyQueryDescription: Please enter a question or request.
RagPage.startConversationWithFile: Ask a question to start the conversation about {fileName}.
RagPage.selectFileToChatPlaceholder: Select a file to start chatting
RagPage.startGeneralConversation: Ask me anything, or select a file from the left to chat about its content.
RagPage.typeYourGeneralMessagePlaceholder: Type your message or ask a general question...

SemanticSearchPage.title: Semantic Search
SemanticSearchPage.description: Find information across your documents using natural language.
SemanticSearchPage.enterQueryDescription: E.g., "Find my Q1 report" or "details about project X"
SemanticSearchPage.noMatchesAlertDescription: Your search for "{query}" did not return any relevant files. Try refining your query or check your uploaded documents.
SemanticSearchPage.toastNoFilesDescription: Please upload some files before searching.

AuthContext.loggedOutDescription: You have been successfully logged out.

SettingsPage.title: Application Settings
SettingsPage.description: Manage your preferences and configure application settings.
SettingsPage.currentLanguageHint: The application interface will update to the selected language.
SettingsPage.currentThemeHint: The application will update to the selected theme (Light, Dark, or System default).
